ρ.intent: Define and manipulate semantic layers, structural layers, and operator layers.

ρ0.intent: Base or ground layer containing δ–Φ–Π primitive Tri-Unity.

ρ1.intent: Layer integrating semantic shaping, wave structure, and polarity.

ρ2.intent: Layer defining causal ordering, truth evaluation, and constraint interactions.

ρn.intent: Nth-order meta-layer that contains recursive hierarchical structure.

ρ→TriUnity.intent: Lock δ–Φ–Π signature across layers, ensuring cross-layer consistency.

ρ→ψμλ.intent: Map layer structure into dynamic mode (ψ), weight (μ), and curvature (λ) layers.
